Nitobi.CurrentPageItem

Nitobi.CurrentPageItem Class Reference

A grid toolbar item that will show the current page being viewed by the user when the grid is being used in a paging mode. As the user navigates through the pages of grid data, this value will change. More...

Inheritance diagram for Nitobi.CurrentPageItem:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 CurrentPageItem ()

Detailed Description

A grid toolbar item that will show the current page being viewed by the user when the grid is being used in a paging mode. As the user navigates through the pages of grid data, this value will change.
